question:
With reference to the upcoming Psyche mission of NASA, consider the following statements:
  1. It is to be a planetary orbiter mission.
  2. 16-Psyche is an exoplanet.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Psyche mission is to be launched in 2022. It is an asteroid orbiter mission of NASA that would last till 2027. The spacecraft will rendezvous with the asteroid in 2026. The asteroid would be mapped in detail to understand asteroid’s origin. It is a part of NASA’s Discover Program. Statement 2 is incorrect: The 16-Psyche is the target of the mission. It is an asteroid in the main asteroid belt between Jupiter and Mars. It is one of the most massive asteroids and is reported to be composed of iron and nickel. It will be studied by the Discovery program’s 14th mission.
